resources.string: SMS Forward is a simple app that allows you to redirect SMS
Why would I need this app?

This application have been developed to bypass regional limitations. For example, a service in country A requires a phone number from country A, but your phone number is from country B. You ask a friend from country A to install this app and you will be able to receive SMS from the service in country B.\nHowever, since this is a pretty simple application, it can also serve other purposes.
Should I be careful about something in particular?

Yes, a few things:
- If you are about to ask someone to install this app, you have to trust your contact. This person will be able to read the messages.
- It's possible to create redirection loops between 2+ devices. It's highly recommended to avoid this even if Android has built-in securities.

Can I remove the notification when redirection is enabled?
Yes, in recent Android versions, you have to do a long press on the notification to access the \"hide notification\" feature.
I don\'t want to be notified about redirected SMS. How to disable notifications for specific contacts?
This depends on the SMS application you are using. With Silence or Signal, you can disable notifications in conversation parameters.
